snippet: The British bank said that its business recovered after a “difficult” end of 2014, citing a $5.26 billion profit, compared with $5.21 billion in the same period last year.
lead_paragraph: The British bank said that its business recovered after a “difficult” end of 2014, citing a $5.26 billion profit, compared with $5.21 billion in the same period last year.

headline.main: HSBC Profit Up Slightly on Market Uptick in First Quarter
